words.translation: 그 문제에 대한 인식이 높아지고 있어요.

words.example: The **complexity** of the problem surprised me.
This adds another **dimension** to the problem.
words.translation: 이것은 문제에 또 다른 차원을 더해요.

words.example: I understand the **dynamics** of the situation.
This is an **exception** to the rule.
Consider the implications of this decision.
I took the **initiative** to solve it.
The **intensity** of the debate surprised me.
I propose an **amendment** to the plan.
We need to analyze the demographics.
I accumulated experience over the years.
I compiled a list of resources.
I delegated the task to my team.

words.translation: 다른 사람을 돕는 것에서 기쁨을 얻어요.

words.example: I devoted my time to studying.
I couldn't **conceive** of a better plan.
words.translation: 더 나은 계획을 생각할 수 없었어요.
